summary: In our 17th annual assessment, we reviewed DOD's 82 largest complex programs (worth $1.69 trillion). Our review comes during a time of significant change at DOD. DOD has transferred oversight responsibilities for many programs to the military services that manage them. At the department-level, it is now focusing on developing weapons capabilities faster. We will continue to monitor these changes in oversight. Meanwhile, we found...
title: Weapon Systems Annual Assessment: Limited Use of Knowledge-Based Practices Continues to Undercut DOD's Investments
